title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Infrastructure in Southern Lebanon: Recent Strikes Explained”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah and another terror infrastructure of the organization have been targeted; the IDF has completed additional strikes in southern Lebanon.

Combat aircraft recently targeted a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Ayta Ash-Shab area, and a terror infrastructure of the organization in the Tir Harfa area in southern Lebanon.

In addition, IDF forces conducted fire to remove a threat in the Rashiya al-Fukhar area in southern Lebanon.

Following the alert regarding the incursion of hostile aircraft that was activated recently in the Nahariya area, it was a false identification.

Attached is documentation of the strikes: https://bit.ly/3X5kons
